desc: Arguably one of the best soy sauce in Malaysia. The only UMAMI you need, aged shoyu. First in the market to have such a unique and fragrant soy sauce. First draw soy sauce with natural fermentation. Non GMO Canadian soy beans and NO MSG added. A premium product that will definitely capture your palate.

layout.text:
The magic shoyu that brings out the best in your dishes.
A premium artisan product that is sure to enhance your cooking experience.
Be prepared for an umami experience.
